    • Method Detail

      • getHardwareCommand

        public final Command getHardwareCommand(String action)
        gets the hardware command mapped to the action in input for example: Action -> Hardware Command Turn on -> Turn on light with X10 Actuator Turn off -> Turn off light with X10 Actuator
        Parameters:
        action -
        Returns:
        a Command or null if action doesn't exist or the mapping is not valid

      • synchLocation

        public void synchLocation(int x,
                 int y)
        Sets the object location without invoking an object change notification An user should never use this method. It's needed by the framework and reserver for it's exclusive use.

      • executeTrigger

        public final boolean executeTrigger(Trigger trigger)
        Changes a behavior value accordingly to the value property in the trigger in input without firing a command on hardware. It updates only the internal model
        Parameters:
        trigger - an hardware level trigger
        Returns:
        true if the values is applied successfully, false otherwise

      • executeCommand

        protected final boolean executeCommand(String action,
                     com.freedomotic.model.ds.Config params)
        Executes the hardware command related to the action passed as paramenter using an user command.
        Parameters:
        action - the name of the action to executeCommand as defined in the object XML
        params - parameters of the event that have started the reaction execution
        Returns:
        true if the command is succesfully executed by the actuator and false otherways
